author: jm
msg: fix t/spamd_allow_user_rules.t test failure; turns out the optimisation of header rules in the non-tflags-multiple case was buggy, causing rule misses, since a m//g modifier was being used when it shouldn't have been.  Also, don't delete the source_file hash etc. if we are using allow_user_rules; that stuff is used to recompile the ruleset
